pages.md:
# MONOCHROMATIC COLOR

Add a reddish or bluish tinge (warm or cool color cast) to the **ACROS** and **MONOCHROME** monochrome film simulations. Color can be adjusted on the **WARM–COOL** and **G (Green)–M (Magenta)** axes.

!Monochromatic Color Adjustment

# GRAIN EFFECT

Add a film grain effect.

## ROUGHNESS

| Option | Description                  |
|--------|------------------------------|
| STRONG | Choose for rougher grains.   |
| WEAK   | Choose for smoother grains.  |
| OFF    | Turn the effect off.         |

## SIZE

| Option | Description                  |
|--------|------------------------------|
| LARGE  | Choose for coarser grains.   |
| SMALL  | Choose for finer grains.     |
